mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM loginRecord WHERE loginTime = DATE(NOW());

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt, weekofyear(loginTime) As weeknum FROM loginRecord WHERE weekofyear(loginTime) BETWEEN weekofyear(DATE(NOW()))-4 AND weekofyear(DATE(NOW())) GROUP BY weekofyear(loginTime) ORDER BY weekofyear(loginTime) DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DATEDIFF(NOW(), max(loginTime)) FROM loginRecord WHERE id=#{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into loginRecord(id, loginTime) values(#{uid}, now())
